sourcing.instructions:
1. Arsenic - Obtain from a chemical supplier or specialized metal dealer. 
 2. Erbium - Purchase from a rare earth metals supplier. 
 3. Scandium - Available from metal suppliers that focus on transition metals. 
 4. Silicon - Commonly found at electronics or chemical supply stores. 
 5. Terbium - Can be sourced from rare earth material suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
